weakness.name: Unlicensed Virtual Machines
weakness.desc: Azure is a system formed by Microsoft machines, therefore, it is necessary that Microsoft perform periodic verification of the licenses of the products.

test.steps:
1. Log into the Azure portal as an owner.
  2. Select Network Security Groups.
  3. Choose the NSG to view one of them.
  4. In "Inbound security rules", check that the traffic outbound through the port 1688 is allowed.
